## Proposed Feature
Describe the feature you want to add.

## Motivation
Why should this feature exist?  
What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Implementation
If you have ideas on how this could be implemented, describe them.

## Alternatives
Describe alternative solutions considered (if any).

## Additional Notes
Any extra details, references, or related ideas.
